post_message: "The irony of Brexit repercussions is that those good old (or new) British values we bang on about seem to be falling to pieces around our ears. Diversity, unity, respect, equality might sound like cliches on replay – but they do work for us, if we work for them. That’s why approaches like that of Sadiq KhanKhan are so badly needed now. He’s somehow got his act together during a moment of such uncertainty, doubt and disappointment."
